attributes.action: End BT's Monopoly in the U.K. separating the network provider from the suppliers
attributes.background: BT as a monopoly provides an inadequate service that affects thousands of homes and businesses. This is a terrible system that needs to be opened up to the free market in the same way as the electricity and gas networks. Separation of the network provider and the suppliers will give a fairer system.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition as this isn't something that the Government or Parliament could do. This would be a decision for the Competition and Markets Authority which is independent of both the UK Government and Parliament. You can find out more about the Competition and Markets Authority here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/competition-and-markets-authority/about
